item.title: 欧盟将在人工智能、网络安全和数字技能领域投资 14 亿美元
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五在一份声明中说，欧盟委员会将在2025年至2027年通过数字欧洲计划在人工智能、网络安全和数字技能方面投资13亿欧元（14亿美元）。【原文：The European Commission will invest 1.3 billion euros ($1.4 billion) in artificial intelligence, cybersecurity and digital skills through the Digital Europe Programme for 2025 to 2027, it said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 据《南华早报》报道，长江和记下周不会出售巴拿马运河的战略港口
item.description: 据《南华早报》周五报道，香港企业集团长江和记将不会在下周签署向贝莱德领导的财团出售巴拿马运河两个港口的协议。【原文：Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison will not be signing the deal to sell its two ports at the Panama Canal to a BlackRock-led consortium next week, the South China Morning Post reported on Friday.】

item.title: 调查显示，地缘政治忧虑促使超过 60% 的公司延长外汇对冲期限
item.description: 软件供应商 MillTechFX 周五进行的一项调查显示，全球每三家公司中就有两家计划改变其货币对冲措施，增加对冲额度或延长对冲时间，以应对日益紧张的地缘政治局势。【原文：Two out of three companies around the world are planning to change their currency hedges by adding to them, or keeping them for longer in response to growing geopolitical tensions, a survey on Friday from software provider MillTechFX showed.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，长江和记考虑分拆全球电信资产，着眼于伦敦上市
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，香港企业集团长江和记控股有限公司已开始准备在全球范围内分拆其电信资产，并在伦敦证券交易所上市。【原文：Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd has started preparations to spin-off its telecommunication assets globally and list the business on the London Stock Exchange, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪在意大利签署汽车零部件分销协议
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪周五表示，该公司与意大利公司Intergea签署了一项汽车零部件分销协议，这是其加强在欧洲重要市场的战略的一部分。【原文：Chinese electric automaker BYD said on Friday it signed a car parts distribution deal with Italian company Intergea, as part of its strategy to boost its presence in a key European market.】

item.title: 分拆 Amrize 后，Holcim 将以并购交易为目标促进增长
item.description: 瑞士水泥生产商 Holcim 公司周五表示，该公司的目标是到 2030 年，息税前利润年均增长 6% 至 10%，其中部分动力来自兼并和收购。【原文：Holcim is targeting average annual growth in earnings before interest and taxes of 6% to 10% by 2030, driven in part by mergers and acquisitions, the Swiss cement maker said on Friday.】

item.title: 华尔街严阵以待特朗普的关税政策；不确定性迷雾仍未散去
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）定于4月2日宣布的关税政策可能会拨开今年以来笼罩金融市场的不确定性迷雾，但很少有投资者期望得到他们所寻求的明确指导。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's scheduled April 2 tariff policy announcement could clear a fog of uncertainty that has clouded financial markets this year, yet few investors expect to get the definitive guidance they seek.】

item.title: 华尔街期货因关税问题走低；通胀数据即将出炉
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货承压，因为投资者正努力应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收更多关税的前景，并密切关注当天晚些时候发布的一份至关重要的通胀报告。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were under pressure on Friday as investors grappled with the prospect of more tariffs from President Donald Trump and kept a close eye on a pivotal inflation report due later in the day.】

item.title: 埃利奥特在英国石油公司的竞选活动中大举做空壳牌股票
item.description: 据财务文件显示，美国激进对冲基金埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）以英国石油公司股东的身份，在要求英国石油公司进行更多变革的运动中，大举做空壳牌公司。【原文：U.S. activist hedge fund Elliott Management has taken a big short position in Shell amid its campaign for more change at BP in its capacity as a BP shareholder, according to financial filings.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称印度正考虑取消美国液化天然气进口税以促进购买量
item.description: 四位政府和行业消息人士称，印度正在考虑取消对美国液化天然气（LNG）征收进口税的提议，以增加购买量并帮助削减与华盛顿的贸易顺差，这对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普来说是一个主要的刺激因素。【原文：India is considering a proposal to scrap import tax on U.S. liquefied natural gas (LNG) to boost purchases and help cut the trade surplus with Washington, a key irritant for President Donald Trump, four government and industry sources said.】

item.title: 交易下滑冲击美国高等级债券供应，利差承压
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战阻碍了交易，用于资助兼并的美国高等级公司债券发行量已降至五年来的最低水平，这对借款人来说可能是一个利好，但对银行和投资者来说却是一个挑战。【原文：The pipeline for U.S. high-grade corporate bond issuance to fund mergers has fallen to the lowest levels in five years as President Donald Trump's trade war deters deals, in what could be a boon for borrowers but a challenge for banks and investors.】

item.title: 中国建设银行称已推出基于 DeepSeek R1 的内部财务模型
item.description: 中国建设银行周五表示，该行已于今年早些时候完成了基于 DeepSeek R1 的大型金融模型的私有化部署。【原文：China Construction Bank said on Friday it had completed the private deployment of a large financial model based on DeepSeek R1 earlier this year.】

item.title: 美国物流公司就帮助中国公司运输芬太尼化学品的指控达成和解
item.description: 据美国当局称，美国航运和物流公司 IMC Pro International 已同意向美国政府支付 40 万美元，以了结其帮助中国化工公司向美国运输芬太尼制造化学品的指控。【原文：U.S. shipping and logistics company IMC Pro International has agreed to pay $400,000 to the U.S. government to settle allegations that it helped Chinese chemical companies ship fentanyl-making chemicals to the United States, according to U.S. authorities.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 震荡美股面临关税和就业数据考验
item.description: 未来一周，唐纳德-特朗普总统关税计划的关键截止日期以及一份可能揭示经济放缓的就业报告将对摇摆不定的美国股市构成考验。【原文：A rocky U.S. stock market will be tested in the coming week by a pivotal deadline for President Donald Trump's tariff plans and an employment report that could reveal a slowing economy.】

item.title: 受特朗普液化天然气计划影响，美国天然气企业重新聚焦海恩斯维尔盆地
item.description: 美国天然气生产商和投资公司正在为路易斯安那州海恩斯维尔页岩盆地的更多活动做好准备，以迎接唐纳德-特朗普总统新批准的液化天然气出口热潮。【原文：U.S. natural gas producers and investment firms are gearing up for more activity in Louisiana's Haynesville shale basin, positioning themselves for a boom in liquefied natural gas exports boosted by new approvals from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 资深立法者称欧盟可能在美国关税争端中对贝宝收取费用
item.description: 一位欧洲资深立法者周五表示，作为与美国关税争端的一部分，欧盟可能会对 PayPal 收取费用。【原文：The European Union could charge fees on PayPal as part of a tariff dispute with the United States, a senior European lawmaker said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）就发动机重启问题对 200 多万辆本田汽车展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周五表示，正在对 220 万辆本田汽车的发动机重启问题展开工程分析。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Friday it was opening an engineering analysis into 2.2 million Honda vehicles over concerns related to its engine restarting.】

item.title: 德意志银行曲折的现代史
item.description: 德意志银行延长了首席执行官克里斯蒂安-苏云（Christian Sewing）的合同，同时作为管理层改革的一部分，其副手和另一名高管将离职，从而巩固了这家德国最大贷款机构的领导团队，为其下一阶段的扭亏为盈做好准备。【原文：Deutsche Bank has extended CEO Christian Sewing's contract, while its deputy and another top executive will depart as part of a management revamp, cementing the leadership team of Germany's largest lender for the next phase of its turnaround.】

item.title: 育碧成立腾讯支持的子公司后，股价上涨 13-15
item.description: 周五，育碧股价盘前上涨 13-15%，此前这家法国视频游戏制造商宣布计划与腾讯合作成立一个部门。【原文：Shares in Ubisoft were seen up 13-15% premarket on Friday after the French video-game maker announced plans to set up a unit with Tencent , two traders said.】

item.title: 印度政府消息人士称，印度向美国提出削减农产品进口关税，期待贸易成功
item.description: 两位政府消息人士称，印度已提出对进口杏仁和蔓越莓等美国农产品削减关税，作为对美国的进一步让步，希望以此避免唐纳德-特朗普总统定于下周实施的对等关税。【原文：India has offered tariff cuts on imports of U.S. farm products like almonds and cranberries as a further concession to the United States, two government sources said, hoping to avert President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs set for next week.】

item.title: 独家：印度国有企业寻求入股澳大利亚 SQM 锂项目
item.description: 四位消息人士称，印度四家国有企业正在与智利矿商 SQM 谈判，以 6 亿美元收购其在澳大利亚两个锂项目 20% 的股份，这是新德里为确保关键电动汽车电池金属供应所做的最大努力。【原文：Four Indian state firms are in talks with Chilean miner SQM to acquire a 20% stake in its two lithium projects in Australia for $600 million, four sources said, in New Delhi's biggest effort to secure supplies of the key EV battery metal.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行任命亚历克西斯-科勒为执行副总裁
item.description: 法国银行业巨头法国兴业银行（Societe Generale）周五宣布任命亚历克西斯-科勒（Alexis Kohler）为执行副总裁，任期自 2025 年 6 月起。【原文：French banking giant Societe Generale announced on Friday the appointment of Alexis Kohler as executive vice president, effective June 2025.】

item.title: 印度批评 X 称合规网站为审查工具
item.description: 路透社周五查阅的法庭文件显示，印度批评埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司错误地将一个允许科技公司通知有害网络内容的官方网站贴上了 "审查门户 "的标签。【原文：India has criticised Elon Musk's X for wrongly labelling as a "censorship portal" an official website that allows tech companies to be notified about harmful online content, court papers reviewed by Reuters showed on Friday.】

item.title: 市场为日本央行削减超长期债券购买量做好准备
item.description: 分析师称，日本央行可能在下周发布第二季度债券购买计划，其中可能包括削减超长期债券的购买规模，从而朝着缩小其在债券市场的巨大影响力迈出另一个关键步骤。【原文：The Bank of Japan could take another key step toward diminishing its huge presence in the bond market next week, when it releases its bond-buying plan for the second quarter that may include a cut in the size of super-long bond purchases, analysts say.】

item.title: 泰国官员：目标是将对美贸易顺差降至 200 亿美元
item.description: 泰国一位工业官员周五表示，泰国的目标是通过进口更多美国产品，将对美贸易顺差减少到 200 亿美元。【原文：Thailand is aiming to reduce its trade surplus with the United States to $20 billion by importing more U.S. products, an industry official said on Friday.】

item.title: 台湾称中国中芯国际涉嫌非法引诱技术工人
item.description: 台湾当局周五表示，他们正在调查中国最大的芯片制造商中芯国际是否在岛内一家伪装成萨摩亚人的空壳公司的掩护下非法诱骗台湾技术工人。【原文：Taiwan authorities said on Friday they were investigating whether China's largest chipmaker SMIC illegally lured Taiwanese tech workers under cover of a shell company on the island masquerading as Samoan.】

item.title: 早间竞标关税大屠杀仍在继续
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 特朗普反复无常的关税政策动摇欧洲市场牛市信心
item.description: 欧洲股市和欧元在第一季度表现抢眼，许多人担心这夸大了计划中的公共开支增长能以多快的速度重振该地区依然低迷的经济，并使其免受贸易战风险的影响。【原文：Investors are calling time on a rally in European stocks and the euro after a blistering first quarter that many fear has exaggerated how fast a planned public spending boom can revive the region's still sluggish economy and shore it up against trade war risks.】

item.title: 在特朗普关税政策下，美国汽车买家面临价格上涨、选择减少的局面
item.description: 业内专家表示，各大汽车制造商可以通过多种方式应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对美国进口汽车征收关税，但所有这些方式都会导致价格上涨、车型选择减少或限制消费者的功能。【原文：Major automakers can deal with President Donald Trump's tariffs on U.S. auto imports in a number of ways, but all of them lead to higher prices, fewer choices of models or limits on features for consumers, industry experts said.】

item.title: 丰田汽车 2 月份全球产量连续第二个月增长，得益于稳健的日本销量
item.description: 丰田汽车公司周五表示，去年从日本国内市场的认证丑闻中恢复过来后，受日本产量增加和销售强劲的推动，2月份全球产量连续第二个月增长。【原文：Toyota Motor said on Friday its global production rose for the second consecutive month in February, driven by higher output and stronger sales in Japan after recovering from a certification scandal in its home market last year.】
